title: Microsoft is Shutting Down Mixer - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.23.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Microsoft shutting down Mixer, Facebook buying Ready at Dawn, and more! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:30 - Mitch Dyer Calls Out Former IGN Employees
00:08:13 - Microsoft is shutting down Mixer - Brendain Sinclair @ GiBiz
00:21:50 - What do you think are the long term implications of an Xbox-Facebook partnership? - Best Friends Q:Eamon in DC (pronounced a-men)
00:24:48 - We Have an Idea of the 7 EA games coming to Switch over the next year - Jeffy Grubb Grubb @ VentureBeat
00:30:45 - Ghost of Tsushima has gone gold and we have an ESRB description - Cian Maher @ VG247
00:33:10 - Facebook has acquired Ready at Dawn - Brendain Sinclair @ GiBiz
00:42:21 - Marvel’s Avengers confirmed as free upgrade to PS5 - Jordan Sirani @ IGN
00:47:15 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:54:54 - If this game holds up from the previous games, will we want a new game from Crash, or go back to remake some classics like Wrath of Cortex or Twinsanity - Zig
00:57:30 - Squad Up: Grayling Thibodeaux(Xbox) - MS 98 Paint
00:58:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary
